user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for reliable and functional suspenders that would provide comfort and convenience, especially in situations where metal detection is a concern.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a solution to avoid the hassle of airport security screenings due to metal buckles on my suspenders. The unique feature of being metal-free and the convenience of passing through security without additional checks were key factors in my decision. The quality and design also appealed to me, as I needed something that would be both functional and stylish for various occasions.

I needed a reliable and practical solution to keep my pants up without the worry of them falling down. The high-quality construction and the assurance that they would fit a variety of pants were important to me. I was initially skeptical about the small fasteners, but positive reviews and the overall quality convinced me to make the purchase.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing that is well-made, durable, and comfortable. I value features such as pockets, quality materials, and a good fit, especially in casual and workwear. I appreciate items that can withstand rough treatment and maintain their shape and quality after washing. Additionally, I tend to favor products that offer a good balance of style and functionality, as well as those that are easy to care for. On the other hand, I dislike thin or flimsy materials, poor workmanship, and items that do not fit well or shrink significantly after washing. I also prefer not to deal with overly complicated features or designs that detract from the practicality of the clothing.

conversation.content: I want to find reliable and functional suspenders that are comfortable and convenient, especially in metal detection situations. within my expected price range: [13.99, 23.95]

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Dockers Men's Solid Suspender> / Item ID: B0857HCD4G / Price: $13.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Suspenders'] / Description: ['These solid adjustable suspenders by Dockers are practical enough for any man. Made with high quality silver-toned clips, they will stretch up to 48 inches. Never worry about your pants falling down again. One size fits most.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <McGuire Nicholas 115 Suspenders in Black> / Item ID: B09M5Q323Z / Price: $14.01 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Suspenders'] / Description: ['Product Description', 'Black, heavy duty, 2" wide suspenders, fully front straps, heavy duty nickel plated clips, made of heavy duty nylon web material & one size fits most, adjustable.', 'From the Manufacturer', 'This pair of suspenders has 2-inch wide straps for added comfort. The fully adjustable front straps make these suspenders ideal for most sizes.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Dickies Men's Industrial Strength Suspenders> / Item ID: B0B3S469CT / Price: $21.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Suspenders'] / Description: ['These Industrial Strength Suspends from Dickies are sure to be your new everyday go-to. The sleek and timeless style is durable and meant to last. Featuring a clip closure and X-back construction, these suspenders from Dickies will be your new favorite. Pair with Khakis, jeans or other pants to create an effortlessly cool and functional look. Since its beginnings in 1922, every piece of Dickies workwear has stood for the quality, toughness, and pride that embodies the spirit of the American worker.']

The <Holdup 2" Wide Contractor Suspenders with Patented Composite Plastic Gripper Clasps> (B09XLQYY3G) priced at $26.95 offer a unique advantage over the Dickies Men's Industrial Strength Suspenders.
